extendedInfo.description: The Effectory Response App helps you discover the up to date response to your survey! Feedback from employees and customers is a crucial element in organisational performance and innovation. Get the best out of your employees and customers and ask for feedback through an Effectory survey. The Effectory Response App allows you to see, at any given place or time, how much feedback has been given and where the response is lagging behind. The Response App is 100% free. To use the Response App, Effectory log in credentials are needed. These credentials are available to Effectory customers. Effectory is Europeâs leading expert in employee surveys and (internal) customer surveys.
